QuestData.Title: Knowledge Is Power
QuestData.Description: The Zandalari here practice a different kind of magic. We must understand it before we can defeat it, $c.$b$bTheir control over the arcane and shadow is impressive. I wish to learn how they have achieved what so many others have not.$b$bI believe their ritual artifacts may hold the answers I seek. Bring me a sampling of the artifacts you find, and I will ensure you are rewarded properly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve 6 Ritual Artifacts from around Conqueror's Terrace.
